queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.privileged is unset or false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.privileged is true

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation is undefined

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.resources.limits.memory is undefined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.resources.requests.memory is undefined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop is undefined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=role-for-k8s-manager-service-account-app.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

files.expected_value: metadata.name=role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=role-for-mogenius-operator-service-account-app.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

files.expected_value: metadata.name=role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=role-for-mogenius-k8s-manager-service-account-app.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.readinessProbe is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: metadata.namespace is undefined or null

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=mogenius-k8s-manager has resources defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=mogenius-k8s-manager doesn't have resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=mogenius-k8s-manager should have resources defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=mogenius-k8s-manager doesn't have resources defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{mogenius-k8s-manager}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{mogenius-k8s-manager}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.capabilities is undefined

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{k8s-manager-data}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{k8s-manager-data}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{k8s-manager-data}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{k8s-manager-data}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{mogenius-k8s-manager}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is undefined
